author: Gary Anderson
comment: Face will crash occasionally if I set the display time to anything other than 5 seconds. Also both passive mode faces look really really bad. Should have stuck with simple full size hands.

reply.author: Scoon Design
reply.content: Hello Gary. Do still have problems? Can we help? You can fully customize ambient mode. Full size hands are not part of this design. Maybe our new watch is better for you? Find a picture attached https://plus.google.com/+Scoondesign/posts/fLxJBVuJd2B?pid=6231391572586317106&oid=117811753528427721882

comment: Paid for a what I thought was a cool watch face turns out to be the disappearing watch face never made it to phone or watch.....so basically I gave away my hard earned money, guess that's the way it works disappointment is the word for this one, no refund button either.

reply.content:
Hello,

title: not working

author: Phil N
comment: Gears move way too  fast like the other guy said.  Looks like a crappy animation on the watch the ad looks 100x better then it really is.  Plus the app won't load until the refund button stops working.  As $ holes.. Don't buy.  Try another one. Refund me scoon.you have my account email. Had nothing to do with blue tooth sync, the app downloaded and refused to show itself until after I wasnt able to use the refund button. I know the app is cheap but it's the principal of your false advertising

reply.author: Scoon Design
reply.content:
Xavior, 
Please contact us at ScoonDesign@gmail.com. We don't have account emails in our list of orders, only Order numbers. Any loading or not loading isn't handled by us, thats handled by the bluetooth communication between your phone and watch. If you aren't satisfied with your purchase, all we need is a transaction number.

title: Looks cartoonish photo shopped ad

author: Todd Maki
comment: Looks fantastic, but crashes within seconds of launching on my moto 360.

reply.author: Scoon Design
reply.content:
Todd, Please contact us via scoondesign@gmail.com we'd love to walk you through the process of capturing a wear bug report so we can diagnose the issues.
Thanks

title: Unfortunately, ScoonWear Tourbinator has stopped.

author: Brick Paver Sealing Pasco, Hernando & Hillsborough
comment: New to smart watches, can't seem to figure out how to use this app and open it on my phone or watch..... HELPPP!! (I will change to a 5 star review once I get it figured out)     UPDATE: My watch needed to be updated once I updated it, it worked fine. Also, within 48 hours (on a saturday) the designer emailed me on instructions. Looks awesome! Wish I could add or remove some dials and customize it a bit... seems like a lot of moving parts I'd like to simplify a bit to make it look a little more real.

reply.author: Scoon Design
reply.content:
Hi Nick,
Please contact us at ScoonDesign@gmail.com
We would love to help any way we can.

title: Awesome!

comment: The developer is prompt to resolve issues.

reply.author: Scoon Design
reply.content:
We've sent an email detailing steps we can take together to get any issues resolved. 
Please look for it in your inbox.
Thanks,
Scoon Design

title: Works on LG G Watch R

author: Shawn Mckenzie
comment: It works but gears move to fast, drains battery completely in less than 4 hours, on a normal watch face I get up 32 hrs

reply.author: Scoon Design
reply.content:
Shawn, 
If there is a bug in the watch causing any drain we would love to work it out with you. Please contact us at ScoonDesign@gmail.com . We are aware that watchfaces can suit many but not all tastes, if you are not satisfied with your purchase, please allow us to do whats necessary to make it right.
Thanks,
Scoon Design

author: Harvz B
comment: Doesn't work on Samsung Gear Live

reply.author: Scoon Design
reply.content: We would be happy to work with you to find out what "doesn't work". Please email us at scoondesgn@gmail.com. We have other Gear Live users that have no problem. We look forward to solving any issues that you are having.

author: Michael Riley
comment: Beautiful

reply.author: Scoon Design
reply.content: Thanks for the review.

author: Jamie MacFarlane
comment: Well done you listened and sorted out the ambient mode. A sign of a good developer. But on Samsung gear it must be all black and white for the 3rd ambient mode. What is happening is because there is still colour in the corners of the square screen. It still mucks up.

reply.author: Scoon Design
reply.content:
Hello Jamie,
We've fixed the square corners not turning off in ambient mode. Apologies. Please install 2.02 the update when it syncs in a couple of hours to the Play store.
Thanks for spotting that and letting us know.

title: Well done but

author: Jared Leith
comment: Update has fixed all, and this face will get even better I believe. Thanks devs.

reply.author: Scoon Design
reply.content:
Edit: Thanks for your support Jared. We really appreciate it!

We've updated the weather api in the latest release and will be publishing an update today or tomorrow that will add an ambient dial. Please get in touch with us via hangouts or gmail scoondesign@gmail.com if these updates don't solve your problems.

title: Awesome

reply.content: Great Gabriel. Hope you like our new updates. Smoother animation/ dim mode / better weather

title: Tourbinator

author: Cliff Brathwaite
comment: Now that I know how to find it it on my phone and watch, I am very happy with it!!!

reply.author: Scoon Design
reply.content: Great. We all have to get used to the new way of Wear to Mobile interface. Thanx for the rating!

title: I love it

author: mark greentree
comment: Works & looks great as long as it's set to sweep for the second hand, a bug I hope is soon ironed out or pointed out in the instructions.

reply.author: Scoon Design
reply.content:
Dear Mark,
This is not a bug. Some watches are not able to handle sweep second and animation. You can then set it to tick. This will halt all animations. You can enable them again by selecting sweep in the menu. Please give us a good rating if you found the setting.

title: LG G Watch R

author: Tim Kirschke
comment: Love the look of the watch face, I've been following since you guys started the design of it. Wasn't sure how to change things through watch face till I received a link on it which I felt kinda slow on. Should of realized it first haha.  But you did an amazing job..

reply.author: Scoon Design
reply.content: Thank you Tim. We can always try to improve the users experience.

author: Rick Katribe
comment: Although a complex watch face, colors may be selected which make it easier to read. I would like to see the secondary face on my G Watch R to be much more simplified, though. I can't wait to see how you incorporate weather into the design!

reply.author: Scoon Design
reply.content: Dear Rick, We implemented weather today. We hope you like the dials.
